mapper.select: select ec.title title, ec.cover cover, ec.lesson_num lessonNum, et.`name` teacherName, s1.title subjectLevelOne, s2.title subjectLevelTwo, ec.price price FROM `edu_course` ec LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id= et.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject s1 on ec.subject_id=s1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject s2 on ec.subject_parent_id=s2.id where ec.id=#{courseId}
